Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near Garfield/Artesian
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield  buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California and 55th: due to, street blockage near Garfield/Artesian.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Western, 51st, California, 55th and over regular route, due to street blockage near Garfield/Artesian.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Elston
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Elston, Bryn Mawr, Central and Milwaukee near Foster/Elston.

How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Elston, Bryn Mawr, Central, Milwaukee and over regular route, due to street blockage near Foster/Elston.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.
